short_summary: Request for Standing Offer, Highway Tractor Trailer Rental / Demande doffre à commandes, Location de Semi-remorque Routier
full_summary:
# Highway Tractor Trailer Rental - Standing Offer - Product and Material Trailers

**Tender Information**
* **Tender Reference**: WS-410-405-4309-Doc-4583467139
* **Solicitation Number**: WS-410-405-4309
* **Publication Date**: May 14, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 28, 2024, 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Number**: 2

**Scope of Work**
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category**: SRV - Services
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None specified
* **Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia
* **End User**: Department of National Defence (DND)

**Contact Information**
* **Contactor Name**: Tara Sheppard (elle-la-lui / she-her-hers)
* **Contact Email**: [tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice**
* **Notice URL**: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19694464?extsite=MTk2OTQ0NjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer

This is a standing offer procurement for the rental of highway tractor trailers for product and materials.

**Technical Specifications**
* **Product and Material Trailers**: 25181700 (UNSPSC code)

**Contract and Maintenance**
* **Contract Expected Start Date**: None
* **Contract Expected End Date**: January 31, 2026
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) - Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

**Procurement Process**
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Procurement Method Description**: The bidder must submit a proposal that meets all the requirements and following all the instructions. The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest price. 

Please note that all parts of original text were rewritten, words were reduced and all languages parts were included in
